Content: A super simple playground example of providing a blog using .NET 6 and Blazor WASM.

• Simple JSON file for blog entries.
  • Customisable blog entry header.
  • Customisable filtering on year, month, day, author, tag cloud, permalink.
  • Pagination for all filters.
  • Tag cloud with weighted rendering.
  • Customisable permalinks.
Title: InternetWideWorld.com
Author: George Leithead
